Package clientSide.stubs

Class AssaultPartyStub

java.lang.Object
clientSide.stubs.AssaultPartyStub
public class AssaultPartyStub extends Object
Stub to the Assault Party. It instantiates a remote reference to the assault party. Implementation of a client-server model of type 2 (server replication). Communication is based on a communication channel under the TCP protocol.
